posts.post_title: FS or FT - T202 Hassan - Ford Putting Over a Spitter - SOLD
posts.post_content:
I have the following T202 Hassan available for sale or for trade.  Looking for comparable condition cards in trade. PM me or email me at [url]jandcristi@verizon.net[/url] to buy, make an offer or if you have any available for trade.  Price includes shipping and is net to me through PayPal or by check.

Jay
